Text:
Stage 20 will be uploaded on Sunday morning about 2am BST (01:00 UTC)

Stage 21 highlights (Sunday evening) will contain all the other stages. If you only want stage 21 then set your BitTorrent client to just download stage 21 and skip all the other stages. Or you can add all the previous files and help with the seeding. The estimated size of the complete 2011 highlights torrent is 11GB.
thank you, thank you, thnak you!!!
